name: Corona Blossom Vol.3 Journey to the Stars
description: In the midst of a furious battle, the launch countdown begins. Time is running out for Keiji and his friends. Will the quest to help R-ne return home be successful? Find out in the thrilling and heartwarming conclusion to the Corona Blossom trilogy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista/7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM320MB, 1280×720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound Additional Notes: Windows Media Player 9 equivalent or higher
recommended_requirements: OS: Vista/7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.66GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM512MB, 1280×720 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound Additional Notes: Windows Media Player 9 equivalent or higher
